long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.fc22 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 22. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.fc22
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.fc21

golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.el6

Package golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.el6: * should fix your issue, * was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository, * should be available at your local mirror within two days. Update it with: # su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.el6' as soon as you are able to. Please go to the following url: https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-7426/golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.el6 then log in and leave karma (feedback).
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.4.git991a7a2.fc21 has been pushed to the Fedora 21 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.5.git1e2e08e.fc22 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 22. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2015-a11f621c0d
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.5.git1e2e08e.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2015-8aab9e6b12

golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.5.git1e2e08e.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. If you want to test the update, you can install it with $ su -c 'dnf --enablerepo=updates-testing update golang-github-vishvananda-netlink' You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2015-a11f621c0d

golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.5.git1e2e08e.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. If you want to test the update, you can install it with $ su -c 'dnf --enablerepo=updates-testing update golang-github-vishvananda-netlink' You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2015-8aab9e6b12

golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.5.git1e2e08e.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. If you want to test the update, you can install it with $ su -c 'yum --enablerepo=epel-testing update golang-github-vishvananda-netlink' You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-fca8b58d10

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
golang-github-vishvananda-netlink-0-0.5.git1e2e08e.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
